text:
@GovMurphy Mr. GOVERNOR, 
Think now is the time to treat your constituents like adults. 
We have dealt with every other issue not named Covid19 without taking total control of the populous. And we survived as a whole. 
#cureworsethancause
#SmallBusiness 
#povertykillstoo
